definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: Letters and Complaints Bureau if it is only transferred to the State, who come to supervise it?
sentences.chinese: 国家信访局如果只是转送，谁又来督办呢？

sentences.english: This case is now under the control of the ministry of public security.
sentences.chinese: 此案被公安部列为督办案件。

definition: to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
to charge (an entity) with (a task)/to assign (sb) the task of
to write comments on a report submitted by a subordinate/written comments from a superior
to hold accountable/to blame/to censure/to apportion blame
to supervise (troops)/to appoint (officers)/to select and assign
inspector-general of province in Ming and Qing times
provincial military governor during the early Republic of China era (1911-1949 AD)
to punish (someone)/to take disciplinary action against (someone)
